aboutMe.content: 3 years of professional experience in web developer. Currently work as a Development Team lead at PkTeam. Experience with software development environment. Excellent eyes and hands at finding and correcting errors in code.

Excellent Command on Laravel, HTML5, CSS3, PHP7, JavaScript, React.js, jQuery, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, GraphQL, MySQL, Ajax. TDD & Unit testing. Worked on APIs (Rest and soap). Good understanding of Git and Jira.
